text: Nokku kala ka yaltirɗaa, fewtinir yeeso maa ngon baŋŋe Suudu Hormorteendu ndun, nokku kala ka ngonɗon, fewtiniree geece mon ɗen baŋŋe mayru fii wata wonan yimɓe ɓen hujja e hoore mo'on - so wanaa ɓen tooñuɓe e maɓɓe. Wata non on huluɓe, Hulee Lam, fii no Mi Timminira neema Am On e mo'on, belajo'o on feeway
